document_data.name: ''Exterminator's Axe''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Exterminator's axe''''' was the enchanted [[battleaxe]] that belonged to the [[duergar]] slaver [[Gekh Coal]] ''circa'' [[1492 DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Exterminator's axe'' was a heavy two-handed axe, crafted with masterful skill. The blade and the haft were covered in intricate engravings.
document_data.Powers: This axe was a scourge of pests. When wielded against plants, insects, or small-sized creatures, it dealt additional fire damage.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''exterminator's axe'' was in possession of Gekh Coal, the leader of a small duergar raiding squad who massacred [[deep gnome]] [[fluorite]] miners and attacked a peaceful [[myconid]] colony in the vicinity of the [[Moonrise Towers]] in the [[Underdark]].
